set.name: DMART-23 Fabulous Art: Wake up Dragons ♪ Dragon Girl's in School Festival

property.name: Rules
property.value: {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you summon this creature, return all your opponent's creatures to their owners' hands. ■ Whenever your opponent would put a command or dragon, put it into their graveyard instead. {ETERNAL OMEGA} (When this creature would leave, return it to your hand instead.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMART-23 Fabulous Art: Wake up Dragons ♪ Dragon Girl's in School Festival

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When this creature would be discarded from your hand by the effect of one of your opponent's spells or creature ability, you may put it instead. ■ When you put this creature, each player shuffles all cards in their hand and graveyard into their deck. Then each player draws 5 cards.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMART-23 Fabulous Art: Wake up Dragons ♪ Dragon Girl's in School Festival

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This creature costs 1 less to summon for each spell in your graveyard. It can't cost 0 or less. {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, return any number of spells from your graveyard to your hand. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may cast a spell from your hand for no cost.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMART-23 Fabulous Art: Wake up Dragons ♪ Dragon Girl's in School Festival

property.name: Rules
Set
property.value: DMART-23 Fabulous Art: Wake up Dragons ♪ Dragon Girl's in School Festival

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GUARD STRIKE} (When you add this creature from your shield zone to your hand, you may reveal it to your opponent and choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature can't attack this turn.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, choose up to 2 non-creature cards in the battle zone. Put them into their owner's mana zone tapped. ■ Whenever a card in the battle zone is put into your mana zone, draw a card.

property.name: Set
